alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:57PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain near the Sweetwater Mountains, Mason Valley, Yerington, and Fallon through 500 PM PDT... At 355 PM PDT, meteorologists were tracking showers and thunderstorms with heavy rainfall between along a south to north line from the Sweetwater Mountains to Trinity Junction moving north at 20 to 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall with rates up to 1 inch per hour, gusty winds to 40 mph, and lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding of low spots and poor drainage areas around the Sweetwater Mountains, Mason Valley, Yerington, Fallon, and Trinity Junction is possible. This impacts NV- 338, NV-208, NV-339, Alt US-95, US-95, and US-50 as well. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lahontan Reservoir, Topaz Lake, Fernley, Yerington, Wellington, Silver Springs, Smith, Trinity Junction, Mason, Stagecoach, Wabuska, Hazen, Stillwater, Fort Churchill Station, Walker Lake, and Weed Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Remember to slow down and turn on your headlights in heavy rain.
